description:
The fiery battle between Toriko and Starjun ends here! Will either one of them be able to walk away? And Joie, the power and enigmatic Dark Chef, leader of NEO, appears, but for what purpose? Other than trying to kill Setsuno, that is...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Greatest Enemy in History! "Joie" Appears!
史上最大の敵! "ジョア"出現!!
